article_node.title: Review: 'Long Story Short' is a moving tale of a modern Jewish American family
article_node.summary: The Netflix animated series "Long Story Short" tells the poignant and humorous tale of a middle-class Jewish family over three decades, exploring themes of familial relationships and the passage of time. Created by Raphael Bob-Waksberg and designed by Lisa Hanawalt, the show features vibrant animation and a non-linear narrative, showcasing the lives of siblings Avi, Shira, and Yoshi as they navigate love, identity, and cultural challenges. The series highlights the complexities of being Jewish in contemporary America, offering both comedic and heartfelt moments.
